com.google.publicalerts.cap

Class CapValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.CapValidator

  • public class CapValidator extends java.lang.Object
    Validates portions of the CAP spec that are not possible to express in an XML schema definition file.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public Reasons validate(MessageOrBuilder message, java.lang.String xmlns, java.lang.String xpath, boolean visitChildren)
        Validates the given message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to validate
        xmlns - xmlns of the version whose validation rules are to be applied
        visitChildren - true to also validate child messages
        Returns:
        a collection of reasons storing errors, warnings or recommendations

      • validateAlert

        public void validateAlert(AlertOrBuilder alert) throws CapException
        Validates a CAP alert.
        Parameters:
        alert - the alert to validate
        Throws:
        CapException - if there are validation errors
